title: How Many Calories Are in Pretzels?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in pretzels for a standard 28g serving, including carbs, sodium, protein, fat breakdown, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Pretzels?
assumptions: Standard hard salted pretzels (sticks or twists), plain, no added toppings or dips; based on average commercial brand.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (hard vs. soft), size, flavorings, and baking method. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A 28g serving of hard pretzels contains about 107 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp mustard dip per serving
Add 1 tbsp cheese dip per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 oz of pretzels?
faqs.a: About 107 kcal for a 28g (1 oz) serving of standard hard pretzels.
Yes, a 28g serving has around 349 mg sodium due to salting.
A 28g serving provides about 22.5 g carbs, with 0.9 g fiber.

faqs.q: Calories in soft pretzels vs. hard?
faqs.a: Soft pretzels are higher, around 290 kcal per large one; hard are lower per gram.

faqs.q: Do pretzels have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Modest amounts: 2.9 g protein and 0.8 g fat per 28g serving.
